title: Plat Katarina main LF Plat+/Silver Jungle main

embed.description: Celia / Platinum 3 100LP / 66W 48L Win Ratio 58% / Katarina - 45W 28L Win Ratio 62%, LeBlanc - 6W 8L Win Ratio 43%, Lee Sin - 4W 3L Win Ratio 57%, Ezreal - 4W 2L Win Ratio 67%, Lucian - 1W 2L Win Ratio 33%

body:
Plat account is Celia, but I'm also looking to get Renai to minimally Gold by April.

New to Katarina but so far I've been playing well enough to climb. Good KDA with decent winrates. 

I'm not too try-hard, I care more about enjoying the game than winning. 
Comms preferred, preferably jungle mains for synergy.

Renai's [OP.GG](https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Renai) for the lazy.

replies.body:
KDA Ichikaken 
Plat 4
Jg main
100% wr camile (16 games)
Can play every jgler

Hello,

I also aim to get Gold by April.
I am Udyr/Yi jg main.

Add me in game.
I will add Renai too
